description.value: Due to your blood, you have some resistance to certain types of magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against spells and other magical effects from the same tradition as your lineage. This bonus increases to +2 against sleep and paralysis effects.

value.value: Arcane Dragonblood, Divine Dragonblood, Occult Dragonblood, or Primal Dragonblood
